paragraph.paragraph:
Eiffel is all about reuse. Thousands of reusable components help you develop your applications by standing on the shoulders of previous developers. Here is the documentation on the principal libraries:
base/index.xml EiffelBase : Eiffel Software's acclaimed open-source library covering the fundamental algorithms and data structures of computing science.
com/index.xml EiffelCOM : your tool of choice for building and using Microsoft COM components.
eiffel2java/index.xml Eiffel2Java : Java interface library.
lex/index.xml Lex & Parse
: lexical analysis and parsing libraries.
net/index.xml Net : the client-server library for exchanging object structures across the network, between identical or different machine architectures.
store/index.xml Store : object-relational database interface library.
thread/index.xml
Thread : multi-threading library.
time/index.xml Time : time and date library.
vision2/index.xml Vision2 : the extensive multi-platform graphical library for producing modern GUI applications that will run on Windows as well as Unix, Linux, VMS and other X-based platforms.
web/index.xml Web : Web interface library with support for easy development of CGI scripts in Eiffel.
wel/index.xml WEL
: powerful graphical library for Windows platforms.
